traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.
traits.name: Amphibious

actions.description: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute.
actions.name: Frightful Presence

actions.description: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)

legendary_actions.description: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
legendary_actions.name: Detect

legendary_actions.description: The dragon makes a tail attack.
legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack

legendary_actions.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.
legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

traits.description: The Infernal Tyrant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: At the start of each of the Infernal Tyrant's turns, each creature within 10 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite.
traits.name: Fire Aura

actions.description: The Infernal Tyrant makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw
